headings.content: Leaders in Cable Installation for over 50 years.

texts.content: Our Fibre Optic capabilities span projects around the globe.

items.title: Overhead Line Equipment
items.subtitle: Winches, Clamps, Pole Handling
items.description: Includes a variety of winches that provide a compact, safe and transportable unit for all overhead line work.

items.title: Fibre Installation
items.subtitle: Tornado, Hurricane, Accelair 3
items.description: Includes a large catalogue of cable blowing machines, including our most recent atmos compressor.

items.title: Underground Cable Laying
items.subtitle: Cable Pushers, heavy duty cable rollers
items.description: Includes cable pushers, heavy duty cable rollers, bridge rollers, narrow cable rollers and more.

section_title.title: What do we do?
section_title.subtitle: CBS Products is at the forefront of cabling technology, including the design and installation of manufacturing equipment for HV Transmission Towers, LV Distribution Lines and underground CATV / Telecommunications Networks. See the below video for one of our most popular products, the Tornado.
